name: Wand Magic Demo
description:
A demo of casting magic from a wand, like the witches and wizards that you see in books. (For windows and HTC Vive) There are three spells to cycle through: Incendio, Stupefy, and Accio. Use the Trackpad to change spells. use the trigger button to cast the spell.

Make sure you point the wand directly at the objects to see the effects.

  • Incendio: shoots fireballs affected by gravity.
  • Stupefy: pushes objects away from you.
  • Accio: pulls objects towards you.

If you have feedback or comments, please let me know.
